comment.author: 76275349@N03
comment._content: Remembered  on  Panel 16 to18. Pozieres Memorial. Son of the late William P. and S. Dodds; husband of Aylice Bulmer Dodds, of Lichfield House, Regent Parade, Harrogate, Yorks.

comment.author: 77235581@N00
comment._content: He was born at Shieldfield, Northumberland. He served in 19th Battalion (Tyneside Pioneers) Northumberland Fusiliers, service number 19/164. His parents were called William (an iron moulder) and Sarah Dodds. Martin William was the eldest of 3 children, and was born in the 3rd quarter of 1886, therefore making his age at death 31.
